documents.document: @spektrall @CJCau Port creeps up on you? It's fortified wine, of course it packs a wallop... It's fortified! 😜 Even I know that!

@drrobertlove Hahaha @Slacko_Mitch thinks I'm a redneck because I love a good trucker

@drrobertlove 😳 wow... But NE is awesome 😞
@drrobertlove tee same price as singlet, but you get more fabric... Damn it Doc, if I have to explain the joke it loses its funniness

@robert_trims Nah, I'm pretty sure you fit the definition, bro. Even in the Greek origin "To compete for a prize" https://t.co/MoJmUfmSZs
Try to be nice to your fellow humans, you don't know who won a battle today just by getting out of bed. Be kind, kindness is free.
@LadiesWhoLeague That was a good tweet 👌🏻😜
@emilywaldon2080 I drink a coffee at 5:30pm each day and sleep fine. They once found blood in my Caffeine stream 😜
@emilywaldon2080 what does "decaf" mean?? I know not this word. ☕️☕️
